comment:
* Install related details from an APK or a folder of APK(s).
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getInstallLocation()
methods.comment:
* @return The default install location defined by an application in
         * {@link android.R.attr#installLocation} attribute.

methods.name: public long calculateInstalledSize(@NonNull SessionParams params) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* @param params {@link SessionParams} of the installation
         * @return Total disk space occupied by an application after installation.
         * Includes the size of the raw APKs, possibly unpacked resources, raw dex metadata files,
         * and all relevant native code.
         * @throws IOException when size of native binaries cannot be calculated.

methods.name: public long calculateInstalledSize(@NonNull SessionParams params, @NonNull ParcelFileDescriptor pfd) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* @param params {@link SessionParams} of the installation
         * @param pfd of an APK opened for read
         * @return Total disk space occupied by an application after installation.
         * Includes the size of the raw APKs, possibly unpacked resources, raw dex metadata files,
         * and all relevant native code.
         * @throws IOException when size of native binaries cannot be calculated.

methodNames: public long calculateInstalledSize(@NonNull SessionParams params) throws IOException
public long calculateInstalledSize(@NonNull SessionParams params, @NonNull ParcelFileDescriptor pfd) throws IOException
